name: platformer-game
description: Classic side-scrolling platformer game in the style of Mario. Features pixel art graphics, coin collection, enemies to defeat, platforms to navigate, and a flag to reach. Mobile-ready with touch controls.
author: VRF
features: Multiple platform types (ground, brick, question blocks)

card.title: Super Platformer
card.description: Classic side-scrolling platformer with pixel art and touch controls

summary.overview: Classic Mario-style platformer with pixel art graphics, coin collection, enemies with patrol patterns, stomp-to-defeat mechanics, and mobile touch controls.
summary.exampleUseCase: Jump between platforms, collect coins, stomp enemies, and reach the flag. Works on desktop with keyboard or mobile with touch controls.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Pure Canvas rendering means no dependencies and instant load. Mobile-first touch controls work naturally. Perfect for quick breaks or demoing EVE's component system.
